name: webdav-sync
description: WebDAV File Synchronization Tool. Securely uploads and manages files using WebDAVs.

scripts.build: bun build src/main/file-sync.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm && bun build bin.js --outdir dist --target node --format esm
scripts.build:bundle: bun build src/main/file-sync.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --splitting --packages=bundle && bun build bin.js --outdir dist --target node --format esm --splitting --packages=bundle

author: ngarate
